user.title: Connect to AdGuard Home
user.description: Enter the connection details for your AdGuard Home instance.

reauth_confirm.title: Re-authenticate AdGuard Home
reauth_confirm.description: Please enter updated credentials for your AdGuard Home instance.

discovery_confirm.title: Discovered AdGuard Home
discovery_confirm.description: An AdGuard Home instance was discovered at {host}. Enter the connection details to set it up.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to AdGuard Home

abort.already_configured: This AdGuard Home instance is already configured

init.title: AdGuard Home Options
init.description: Configure polling interval and other options.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the AdGuard Home API for updates (10-3600 seconds).
data_description.query_log_limit: Maximum number of query log entries to fetch (1-10000). Higher values provide more history but may impact performance.
data_description.attr_top_items_limit: Maximum number of top items (clients, domains, recent queries) shown in sensor attributes (1-100).
data_description.attr_list_limit: Maximum number of list items (rewrites, leases) shown in sensor attributes (1-100).
data_description.icon_color: Hex color for blocked service icons (e.g., #44739e). Use lighter colors for dark themes.

set_blocked_services.name: Set Blocked Services
set_blocked_services.description: Set the list of services to block globally in AdGuard Home with optional time-based schedule.

services.name: Services
services.description: List of service IDs to block (e.g., facebook, youtube, tiktok). Any services not in this list will be unblocked.

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: Optional time-based schedule for blocking (v0.107.56+). Times are milliseconds from midnight.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

add_filter_url.name: Add Filter URL
add_filter_url.description: Add a new filter list URL to AdGuard Home.

name.name: Name
name.description: A friendly name for the filter list.

url.name: URL
url.description: The URL of the filter list.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: If true, adds this as a whitelist instead of a blocklist.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

remove_filter_url.name: Remove Filter URL
remove_filter_url.description: Remove a filter list URL from AdGuard Home.

url.name: URL
url.description: The URL of the filter list to remove.

whitelist.name: Whitelist
whitelist.description: If true, removes from whitelists instead of blocklists.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

refresh_filters.name: Refresh Filters
refresh_filters.description: Force refresh all filter lists in AdGuard Home. This downloads the latest versions of all enabled filter lists.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

set_client_blocked_services.name: Set Client Blocked Services
set_client_blocked_services.description: Set the list of services to block for a specific client. This automatically disables 'use global blocked services' for the client.

client_name.name: Client Name
client_name.description: The name of the client to configure (must match a configured client in AdGuard Home).

services.name: Services
services.description: List of service IDs to block for this client.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

add_dns_rewrite.name: Add DNS Rewrite
add_dns_rewrite.description: Add a DNS rewrite rule to redirect a domain to a specific IP or another domain.

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: The domain name to rewrite (e.g., example.com or *.example.com for wildcard).

answer.name: Answer
answer.description: The IP address or domain name to redirect to.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

remove_dns_rewrite.name: Remove DNS Rewrite
remove_dns_rewrite.description: Remove an existing DNS rewrite rule.

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: The domain name of the rewrite rule to remove.

answer.name: Answer
answer.description: The answer (IP/domain) of the rewrite rule to remove.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

check_host.name: Check Host
check_host.description: Check how a domain would be filtered by AdGuard Home. Returns filtering result including reason, matching rules, and blocked service info.

domain.name: Domain
domain.description: The domain name to check (e.g., example.com or ads.example.com).

client.name: Client
client.description: Optional client ID to check filtering rules for a specific client. Uses global rules if not specified. Requires AdGuard Home v0.107.58+.

qtype.name: Query Type
qtype.description: Optional DNS query type to check (e.g., A, AAAA, CNAME, MX). Defaults to A if not specified. Requires AdGuard Home v0.107.58+.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

get_query_log.name: Get Query Log
get_query_log.description: Retrieve paginated DNS query log entries. Supports filtering by domain search and response status.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return (1-5000). Default is 100.

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Number of entries to skip for pagination. Default is 0 (start from most recent).

search.name: Search
search.description: Optional search string to filter by domain name.

response_status.name: Response Status
response_status.description: Filter by response status. 'all' returns all queries, 'filtered' returns only blocked queries.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

clear_query_log.name: Clear Query Log
clear_query_log.description: Clear all entries from the AdGuard Home query log. This action cannot be undone.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.

reset_stats.name: Reset Statistics
reset_stats.description: Reset all AdGuard Home statistics counters to zero. This action cannot be undone.

entry_id.name: Entry ID
entry_id.description: The config entry ID for the AdGuard Home instance. Required only when multiple instances are configured.
